  visibility: hidden;
}

  position: fixed;
  top: 80px;
  left: 50%;
  width: 90%;

  z-index: 1000;
  background-color: #fff;
  border-radius: $default-border-radius;
  opacity: 0;
}

  .modal-container[_ngcontent-sc0] {
    width: 50%;
  }
}

  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  z-index: 2;
  padding: 17px;
  color: $color-gray-dark;
  text-align: center;
}

  position: fixed;
}

  visibility: visible;
}

  opacity: $overlay-opacity;
  visibility: visible;
}

  opacity: 1;
